#### Description

Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

This invitation to tender is for the construction of a new weather radar station near Sechelt, BC. The site is located at the top of Halfmoon Peak and is accessible via an existing forest service road. The project includes the preparation of a gravel laydown area, road rehabilitation, and construction of a platform for the radar station.

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the bidders.

#### Project Description

The scope of work includes:

* Preparation of a gravel laydown area (approx. 35m x 40m) including tree cutting, reduction of bedrock level, grading, and gravel
* Road rehabilitation to allow for safe passage of heavy-duty vehicles ascending and descending the mountain
* Construction of a platform for the radar station including modifications to the chaussée and drainage

#### Tender Documents

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. Tender documents can be obtained from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

#### Delivery Date

The contractor must perform and complete the work within 10 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

#### Estimated Value

The estimated value of the project is between $500,001 and $1,000,000 (GST included).
